objects.text: Rawhide Chews for All Dogs, 4 oz

product_details.description: Treat your pup to a fun ‘n’ flavorful chew! Good ‘n’ Fun Triple Flavor Kabobs contain a savory combination of tasty flavors that dogs crave. These scrumptious chews are made from premium beef hide, savory chicken, delicious pork hide, wholesome duck and hearty chicken liver to create a truly delightful, long-lasting treat your dog is sure to love. Wrapped with premium cuts of real chicken, these chews are a great source of protein. Plus, they're a fun and delicious way to satisfy your dog’s urge to chew, while the natural chewing action helps reduce tartar buildup and remove plaque. Select a treat slightly larger than your pet’s mouth. This product is intended to be chewed. Always supervise your pet during chewing activity, especially if they are known to swallow their treats whole. Provide plenty of fresh drinking water and discard any leftover chunks or fragments. This product is intended for intermittent or supplemental feeding only. Treats should not exceed 10% of your dog’s daily caloric intake. Visit your veterinarian regularly and discuss your pup’s daily caloric requirements based on weight, size, breed, age and activity level. If you have questions about whether this product is right for your dog, consult with your veterinarian.

banner_details:
This banner features a pet product promotion with a clean, eye-catching layout. The top portion displays a prominent brand name (`heading`), followed by a bold product title (`subheading`). A short product description (`description`) is placed centrally under the subheading. The central part of the layout showcases a high-quality image of the product (`product_image`). Toward the bottom of the banner, a large price tag (`price`) is displayed in bold typography, drawing immediate attention. Directly below the price, there's a vibrant call-to-action button with a strong background (`cta_background`) and inviting text (`cta`). The background includes playful curved shapes and soft circular elements to create a friendly and engaging atmosphere.

**Color Palette:**
- Orange: `#E8590C`
- Coral Red: `#FA5252`
- Light Beige: `#FFF5ED`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Warm Brown (Text): `#4A3933`
- Pale Peach accents: `#FFF0F5`, `#FFA94D`
product_color: The product image for "Good ‘n’ Fun Triple Flavor Kabobs" leverages a vibrant, warm color palette dominated by shades of red, orange, and brown, which evoke richness and taste. Primary colors include deep red (#C93028), bright orange (#F7941D), golden yellow (#FBB040), and warm brown (#7B3F00), balanced against a crisp white (#FFFFFF) background to make the product visually pop. These colors are skillfully blended to highlight the savory appeal of the dog treats while creating energetic contrast along the wave patterns and text highlights. The bright white helps to give the entire package a clean and premium look.
